text: Writer-philosopher Hélène Cixous in a discussion with Director of Alliance Francaise Olivier Litvine and author Nicolas Deleau (right) at the Alliance Francaise Maison Colombani in Puducherry on Friday. She was here to talk about her collaboration with French theatre artiste Ariane Mnouchkine and her theatre group Théâtre du Soleil among other things. The pair’s work Les Naufragés du Fol Espoir will be screened today. —Photo: S.S. Kumar
title: Exploring fact and fiction
